instanceArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SSO Instance.

permissionSetArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Permission Set that the admin wants to grant the principal access to.

principalId.description: An identifier for an object in SSO, such as a user or group. PrincipalIds are GUIDs (For example, `f81d4fae-7dec-11d0-a765-00a0c91e6bf6`).

principalType.description: The entity type for which the assignment will be created. Valid values: `USER`, `GROUP`.

targetId.description: An AWS account identifier, typically a 10-12 digit string.

targetType.description: The entity type for which the assignment will be created. Valid values: `AWS_ACCOUNT`.
